description: The notification sent when a user connection event occurs
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventOccurred OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventUsername s EXAMPLE OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventType s EXAMPLE OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventAddress s EXAMPLE OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventDescription s EXAMPLE OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventProtocol s EXAMPLE OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventPort i 9999

description: The user pertaining to the connection event
variables.name: OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventUsername

description: The address of the host to which this connection applies.
variables.name: OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventAddress

description: The description of the host to which this connection applies.
variables.name: OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventDescription

description: The internet protocl to which this connection applies.
variables.name: OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventProtocol

description: The applicable port number of the host.
variables.name: OG-HOST-MIB::oghostEventPort
